subject: Poor shipping time
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

I paid $29.90 for express shipping on order #SSN2791 Tracking
Number SF6045959453583 on september 30th. This order took 8 days to deliver
half the package which was already more than the estimated time. Now the
second half of my order still has not left china as of october 15th. This
is a total of 16 days with no end in sight. I'm very unhappy with this as I
was quoted 2-3 days processing time and approximately 4-6 day shipping.
This is in my opinion unacceptable and I would like a full $29.90 refund
for my shipping fees as my expected service has not been fulfilled.

Ryder Camp

conversations.body_text: Hi Ryder Camp,    We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused. Due to our eight-day holiday period in early October, your order was dispatched from China on the 9th. We shall assess the duration of the delay upon delivery and provide appropriate compensation accordingly.

So you're saying I'll get compensated now that it's been delivered? I still
think a refund for the express shipping is warranted since it wasn't
delivered in the quoted time, regardless of the holiday. Your shipping
information tab on your website states Express Shipping as 3-7 business
days with 1-2 day production time, this adds up to a maximum allowed time
of 9 days after ordering for it to be delivered. I ordered on September
30th and received on October 21. Not counting the day I ordered it took 21
days for my order to arrive. 21 minus the 8 day holiday leaves 13 days
worth of time in shipping.

Ryder Camp
